summary:
This bow will almost ALWAYS insta-kill enemies, and you'll get experience in lock picking with it! xD
<br />
descriptionHtml:
This bow will almost ALWAYS insta-kill enemies, and you'll get experience in lock picking with it! xD
This mod should really only be used in mess around playthroughs, or just when you want to mess around in skyrim, i don't think you should use this bow in a legit playthrough though...
[b][u]
You can re-upload this mod on any site, but with my permission![/u]
INSTALLATION:
[/b]Find your skyrim directory, mine is: Program files x86/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim
Find the "Data" folder inside your skyrim directory.
Put my files from the zip file into the data folder.
Activate the mod from the launcher.
Play.
[size=4]
[u][b]Use help "The Most OP" (Not the full title, but it will bring it up) As i have not learned how to put weapons in areas yet.[/b][/u][/size]
author: Aegis128
